section.title: Defining a bilingual lexicographic resource
section.para: This defines a lexicographic resource where the source language is German and the translation language is English and the English translations are going to come with pronunciation transcriptions in English IPA.

example.title: Pseudocode
example.programlisting: - lexicographicResource (title: My German-English Dictionary, uri: http://example.com, langCode: de) - translationLanguage (langCode: en)
